definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: ape, so Vrss, LXX pi/qhkoi (om. LXX:B in K) (foreign word; prob. = Skr. kapi, id.; Egypt. as loan-word gôfë WMM:As.u. Eur. 95, gi’f Erman:ZMG xlvi (1892), 121; Gk. kh=bov, kh=pov is of Eg. orig. acc. to Lewy:Fremdw.6);—pl. [[קׂפִים]] 1Ki 10:22 = [[קוֹפִים]] 2Ch 9:21, brought to Sol. [from SE.] by Phoenician fleet; cf. Ar. prov. ‘donum regionis Jemen simiae sunt,’ Freytag:Provv. iii. 3160.
